Class ManagerFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • ManagerFunctions
  • public class ManagerFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    All functions that interact with database for the manager side of the POS system

                            java.lang.String price)

        drinkId - string of the new unique drink id
        drinkName - string of the new recipe name
        ingredientNames - string array of the new recipe ingredients
        ingredientValues - string array of the new recipe amounts
        price - string of the new recipe price
        Throws:

      • getFilteredSalesHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getFilteredSalesHistory​(java.lang.String beginningDate,
                                                                                          java.lang.String endDate)
        Get function to get filtered sales history from a start to end date
        Parameters:
        beginningDate - string of start date
        endDate - string of end date
        Returns:
        drinkname, numberOfOrders, totalPrice as a list for every drink
        Throws:
        when - error updating the database using the SQL commands

      • getWhatSalesTogether

        public java.util.HashMap<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>,​java.lang.Integer> getWhatSalesTogether​(java.lang.String beginningDate,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String endDate)
        Returns a hashmap with key being an arraylist (of size 2) of the drinknames, with value being the number of its occurrence from a start to end date
        Parameters:
        beginningDate - string of start date
        endDate - string of end date
        Returns:
        Treemap of arraylist string, integer for each time 2 drinks are ordered together
        Throws:
        when - error updating the database using the SQL commands

      • getExcessReport

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getExcessReport​(java.lang.String beginningDate)
        Get function to return arraylist of excess report for what items in inventory are in excess
        Parameters:
        beginningDate - string of start date
        Returns:
        ArrayList of ingredients that are in excess from the beginning date to present
        Throws:
        when - error updating the database using the SQL commands
